attributes.action: remove the existing structure from the fourth plinth in Trafalgar Square and replace it with a statue of William Wilberforce
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This would be an ideal way to celebrate the 200th anniversary of the abolition of the slave trade and to commemorate Wilberforce's part in that abolition.

The existing structure that currently occupies the fourth plinth is inappropriate, especially in such a prime location.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
